list.name: AUDY RAHMAT, S.H.
list.title: Partner
bio: Audy Rahmat is a Lawyer with decades of experience. He oversees general corporate, the dispute resolution and litigation practice of the firm. His practice focuses on commercial cases typically arising from high-value commercial agreements and transactions

Audy has acted at all levels of trial in Indonesian courts including District Courts (for general disputes and criminal litigation), Commercial Courts (for bankruptcy and suspension of payments, Intellectual Property), and Industrial Relations Courts (for employment disputes), defending clients due to criminal proceeding in Police Authority. Representing Indonesian and international clients in cases relating to debt recovery, torts, insolvency, maritime and shipping, insurance, and other business-related contentious matters. He also acted for clients in domestic and international arbitration.

Audy also has prestigious experience in the field of insolvency, notably when he was entrusted and appointed by the Commercial Court to serve as the Court-appointed Receiver in the bankruptcy proceedings of PT Prowell Energy Indonesia, one of the largest oil contracting companies in Indonesia.

Audy has experiences with high profile cases in special criminal litigation such as money laundering, corruption, and white collar crime when he was lawyer at Elza Syarief Law Office on of the top litigation law firm in Indonesia.

Bringing a wealth of expertise and experience to his role. With a focus litigation and alternative dispute resolution, Audy has established himself as a trusted advocate for clients across a wide range of personal and industries, from national to multinational corporations.
membership: Receiver and Administrator (Asosiasi Kurator dan Pengurus Indonesia - AKPI)

Antoni has experience handling high-profile and important cases in special criminal litigation such as money laundering, corruption and white collar crime when he was a lawyer at Elza Syarief Law Office, one of the top litigation law firms in Indonesia.
